course_description:
Python programming for students well-versed in programming with another imperative language.
Prereq: 2122, 2123, or 2231; and 2321; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, ECE, Engr Physics, or Data Analytics major, or CIS minor. This course is graded S/U.
course_prerequisites: Prereq: 2122, 2123, or 2231; and 2321; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, ECE, Engr Physics, or Data Analytics major, or CIS minor. This course is graded S/U.
